name: Clienteling and Data Intelligence Specialist (Business analyst)
description:
Clienteling and Data Intelligence Specialist will be a part of Client Development team reporting to Client Relationship, Services and Data Intelligence Manager.

Their mission is to implement all clienteling activations via Salesforce, follow up activations' KPIs and lead client data analytics providing PowerBI dashboards.

Responsibilities:

  • Manage collaboration with the agency on Salesforce activations and deploy local activations on request of CR manager and CRM coordinator

  • Monitor client activations performance

  • Produce advanced data analysis, strategic insights and recommendations for client, communication, commercial and marketing teams

  • Design functional, easy-to-understand reports and dashboards with Salesforce and Power BI

  • Support CRM projects delivery and UAT, including Salesforce, NSI, e-card etc.

Requirements:

  • Master's degree in Computer Sciences, Computer Engineering or related field

  • From 2 years to 5 years’ experience in Client reporting and analysis within an international Company

  • Salesforce administrating experience is mandatory (Service Cloud, Marketing Cloud, ext.)

  • Experience in development of dashboards is mandatory

  • Experience in SQL is mandatory

  • Data visualization skills in Power BI is mandatory

  • Solid analytical mindset

  • Good communication and organizational skills

  • Fluent in English and Russian

Conditions:
  • Competitive, stable salary
  • Work in the multinational company
  • Location in the city centre
  • Convenient work schedule
  • Bonuses
  • Wide sphere of responsibility
